pr_title: README: Remove master concourse build status

timeline.bodyText: Why not put the FDW test there instead (pg_regress)?
timeline.author: oliverralbertini

timeline.message:
README: Remove master concourse build status

The PXF C-extension was removed from Greenplum master, and we are no
longer testing against it. Remove the status badge.

README: Remove master concourse build status [ci_skip]

The PXF C-extension was removed from Greenplum master, and we are no
longer testing against it. Remove the status badge.

README: Update master concourse build status [ci_skip]

The PXF C-extension was removed from Greenplum master, and we are no
longer testing against it. Replace the badge with the new pipeline
testing Foreign Data Wrappers in Greenplum master.

README: Update master concourse build status [ci_skip]
